services.name: tesla-table
services.description: Nashville's First Tesla Quantum Table represents a wellness approach to biofield frequency technology based on Nikola Tesla's research into electromagnetic fields and their potential interactions with biological systems. This device generates specific frequency patterns that research suggests may influence cellular communication processes. Each session is wellness-focused, helping clients understand how different frequencies might interact with the body's natural bioelectric systems, with protocols referenced from established frequency research guides.
benefits: May support relaxation and stress reduction
Designed to support comfort and inflammatory response
Intended to support cellular communication and energy
Aims to support energy center balance
May support metabolic function and digestion
Designed to support sense of wellbeing
Intended to support recovery and rejuvenation processes
May support cellular renewal and mental clarity

services.name: roxiva
services.description: RoXiva utilizes light and sound frequency technology to support relaxation and meditative states. This system employs calibrated frequencies designed to encourage brainwave entrainment toward therapeutic patterns associated with stress reduction and mental clarity. Sessions are available from 7 minutes for scheduling flexibility.
benefits: May support relaxation and stress management
May support focus and mental clarity
Provides wellness insight into light-sound therapy

services.name: consultation
services.description: Initial consultation provides a comprehensive 2-hour informational session including wellness assessment, personalized frequency selection via kinesiology methods, and an introductory session. Victoria will develop a personalized wellness plan based on your individual needs and interests.

services.name: remote
services.description: Remote frequency sessions utilize biofield technology principles for distance wellness support. Using specialized equipment, Victoria provides personalized frequency protocols accessible worldwide. These sessions include wellness information about EMF awareness and natural wellness approaches that may benefit both you and your pets.

services.name: herbalism
services.description: Learn about botanical wellness through Victoria's herbalism consultations. Drawing from her master certification studies at the National Health Institute in Maui, Victoria provides wellness information about personalized herbal approaches that may complement your body's natural wellness processes.
benefits: Holistic approach combining herbs with energy medicine
